Posts.Content: I've been out of treatment for 3 years.  The skin is still somewhat tender, but the rash is really ugly.
Posts.Title: Radiation Burns

Posts.Content: I have awful burns.  Some visible even in clothing.  Does anyone know anything that can help?  I already tried laser treatment.  It did not work at all.
Posts.Title: Radiation Burns

Posts.Content: I tried that already.  It feels good, but does not help reduce the appearance of the rash.  Thanks anyway.
Posts.Title: Radiation Burns
